posts.title: Light Up Golf Balls
posts.content: Stay on the greens long after the sun sets when you play with the light up golf balls. These regulation size golf balls each come built with an impressive forty hour internal battery that lights up to a vibrant and clearly visible color. Your wife won’t thank us.

posts.title: Prison Ramen Recipe Book
posts.content: Turn your boring noodle meal into a culinary sensation with help from the Prison Ramen recipe book. It comes full of colorful recipes like “sloppy Ramen Joe” and Danny Trejo’s “Machete Ramen” along with select stories from the inmates who made them.

posts.title: Stegosaurus Dog Costume
posts.content: Transform your furry friend into the prehistoric pet of your dreams with the Stegosaurus dog costume. Ideal for small to medium canines, this costume covers them from head to paw in a detailed dino suit complete with spinal plates and spiky tail.

posts.title: CIA Manual Of Trickery And Deception
posts.content: Learn the ins-and-outs of Cold War era espionage with the “CIA Manual of Trickery and Deception”. You’ll be able to delve deep into the mindset of a covert intelligence operative as you read step-by-step instructions of their training and techniques.

posts.title: Nano Remote Control Quadrocopter
posts.content: Don’t let its size fool you, the nano remote control quadrocopter provides big time fun without breaking the bank. LED lights at each end help you identify the front and back while its small size makes the nano quadrocopter ideal for indoor use.

posts.title: Extreme Post-It Notes
posts.content: Leaving quick notes and reminders at the job site will be more convenient than ever with these Extreme Post-it notes. These 3″ x 3″ notes are made with a water resistant ultra strong dura-hold paper and adhesive that will stick in tough conditions and environments.

posts.title: Wind Up Granny Racers
posts.content: Have fun at the expense of the elderly as you go head to head with a buddy racing these wind up granny racers. They require no batteries and come in the shape of an elderly woman limping along on her walker while grandpa follows on his flashy scooter.

posts.title: Cat Ears Headphones
posts.content: Turn heads while you play your favorite tunes from these cat ear headphones. Apart from emitting an eye-catching neon light, the cat ears double as external headphones you can use to share your music with those around you.

posts.title: Ninja Knife Block
posts.content: Unleash your inner ninja in the kitchen by slicing and dicing with the sword shaped knives in this ninja knife block. This mighty pint-sized warrior stands on constant guard as he holds up a sword styled utility, bread and chef’s knife.

posts.title: Game Boy Refrigerator Magnets
posts.content: Add some geeky flair to your humble abode by transforming your appliances into giant gaming devices with these Game Boy refrigerator magnets. This set of dry erase friendly magnets will instantly turn any appliance with a metal surface into a giant Game Boy.

posts.title: Ultra Realistic 3D Printed Moon Model
posts.content: Explore every nook and crater of our moon without leaving your couch by picking up this ultra realistic 3D printed moon model. Based on data captured by NASA’s Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter, this pint-sized moon is modeled to 0.006 millimeters per pixel precision.

posts.title: Smokey Dry Ice Drink Stirrers
posts.content: Give your tasty cocktails a stunning visual component using these smokey dry ice drink stirrers. Each stirrer is designed to hold food-safe dry ice that creates a billowing smoke cloud around the surface of your drink when inserted.
